line_1: Thine Essence is a vast Abyss
"Yet when the dragon in the deep abyss
line_2: " Ye with the Lamb shall rise to ceaseless bliss,

line_1: O come, and save me from this dark abyss!
line_2: And bear me with you to the realms of bliss!

line_1: Unnumber'd Shoals glide thro' the cold Abyss
line_2: Unseen, and wanton in unenvy'd Bliss.

line_1: 'Twas fear'd he found a dread abyss.
line_2: Alass, he dreamt of solid bliss,

line_1: Fancy it self 'twou'd tire to plumb the Abyss;
line_2: If I for an uncertain Lease of this

line_1: Fancy it self 'twou'd tire to plumb the Abyss;
line_2: Sold the fair hopes of an eternal bliss?
O Height immense! what Words suffice

line_1: "To prove the beauteous World excels the brute Abyss.
line_2: " Perfection forms, and with Perfection Bliss.

line_1: "To prove the beauteous World excels the brute Abyss.
line_2: " Not needeth Proof: To prove it were, I wis,
" When sickening Health and Spirits go amiss?
" Health is the vital Principle of Bliss,
"And Exercise of Health. In Proof of This,

line_1: Some plunge to seek it into death's abyss.
line_2: Till sated, loathing, hopeless here of bliss,

line_1: On steady wing sails through th' immense abyss,
line_2: Plucks amaranthin joys from bow'rs of bliss,
